 Employment 
 The Olympic Park offers a stimulating and competitive environment requiring a variety of trades and skills. Our mission is to make the park a world reference in terms of modern urban parks, a unique crossroads combining creation, discovery, entertainment and physical activity. 
 To apply for a job, please visit our section  Working at the Olympic Park . 
 Live the future of your Olympic Park. Join us, take up the challenge!
